pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gaim (2013, TV show)$(br2)Accessed by going through a $(l:misc/blocks/helheim_crack)Helheim Crack$(/l)$(br2)Structures:$(li)$(l:gaim/structures/yggdrasil_base)Yggdrasil Research Camp$(/l)$(li)$(l:gaim/structures/rosyuo_helheim_city)Rosyuo's Helheim City$(/l)$(li)$(l:gaim/structures/redyue_helheim_city)Redyue's Ruins$(/l)$(li)$(l:gaim/structures/demushu_helheim_city)Demushu's Cave$(/l)
